sqlite-viewer.config.maxFileSize.markdow:
The maximum file size in MB the extension will attempt to load. Set to 0 to disable the limit. The internal limit is 4GB, but platform limits may apply earlier.

__Warning__: Opening large files may cause poor performance, freezes, and system-wide memory pressure.

[Upgrade to PRO](https://vscode.sqliteviewer.app) to remove all size restrictions and unlock additional features.
sqlite-viewer.commands.exportTable.title: Export Table
sqlite-viewer.config.instantCommit.markd:
When this setting is enabled, changes to the database are committed immediately. This setting is ignored for read-only databases.

__Warning__: When this setting is enabled, undo and redo functionality is achieved through "inverted" SQLite statements, which are not guaranteed to work (e.g. another process has modified the same row, etc.)
sqlite-viewer.config.doubleClickBehavior:
Controls the behavior when double-clicking on a cell in the table view.

- **Modal Dialog**: Opens the row in an integrated modal dialog (default)
- **VS Code Editor**: Opens the cell value in a separate VS Code editor tab (PRO feature)
sqlite-viewer.config.checkConstraintPres: Custom check constraint presets for column creation. Key = label shown in dropdown, Value = SQL expression (use "{column}" placeholder)
sqlite-viewer.config.foreignKeyClausePre: Custom foreign key clause presets for column creation. Each item is a SQL clause
sqlite-viewer.config.customColumnTypes.d: Custom column types to add to the built-in types. Each type can specify a UI affinity and codicon icon.
sqlite-viewer.config.customColumnTypes.u: UI affinity for special handling (determines what UI controls are shown)
